special_text:
[+1]: Mill four cards, then return up to one creature card milled this way to your hand. You may activate a different loyalty ability Vivien has this turn.
[+1]: Create a 2/2 green Cat Spirit creature token with “When this creature dies, you gain 2 life.”
[-3]: Choose target creature you don't control. If it has flying, destroy it. Otherwise, up to one target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
[-9]: Create four 4/4 green Hydra creature tokens. Creatures you control gain trample and haste until end of turn.
